Donald Brown

Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Status of Robert Snelling
Dear Sir,
Robert Snelling has an ERA of 5.28 at AA Margate Bridges.
I believe he isn't ready yet for that level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Progress of Richard Wiseman
Dear Sir,
Richard Wiseman is doing pretty good at AA Margate Bridges!
He has an ERA of 1.62, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Status of Mike Bohn
Dear Sir,
Mike Bohn shouldn't play at AA Margate Bridges!
He has an AVG of .151 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
